about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: AI Consultant & Developer
about.intro: Passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence to solve complex business challenges

hero.name: Luis Alberto Gomez Celaya
hero.description: Building intelligent solutions that deliver real business value through modern ML engineering and rapid MVP development

bio.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a Machine Learning Engineer with 3 years of experience building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems. With a background in Biomedical Engineering and hands-on experience at companies like ScaleAI and SoldaAI, I specialize in transforming complex ML concepts into production-ready solutions.

My expertise spans from developing hospital ML systems to creating cutting-edge NLP applications with modern frameworks. I've published research in the field and have a proven track record of delivering MVPs in just 2 weeks for $2-3k, making advanced AI accessible to businesses of all sizes.

What sets me apart is my commitment to rapid delivery without compromising quality. I believe in being highly responsive and available throughout the project lifecycle, ensuring clear communication and exceptional results.

hero.title: Royal AI Solutions Portfolio
hero.description: Transforming businesses with cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions. Explore our collection of innovative projects across multiple domains.

aiChatbot.title: AI Chatbot Platform
aiChatbot.description: Advanced conversational AI platform with natural language understanding and multi-channel support.
aiChatbot.fullDescription: This platform leverages state-of-the-art NLP models to provide intelligent conversational experiences. Built with transformer-based architectures, it supports multiple languages and can be deployed across various channels including web, mobile, and voice assistants.

medicalImage.title: Medical Image Analysis
medicalImage.description: Deep learning system for automated medical image diagnosis with high accuracy and explainability.
medicalImage.fullDescription: A sophisticated computer vision system designed for medical professionals. It uses convolutional neural networks to analyze X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans, providing detailed analysis and highlighting areas of concern with explainable AI techniques.

salesPrediction.title: Sales Prediction Model
salesPrediction.description: Machine learning model for accurate sales forecasting using historical data and market indicators.
salesPrediction.fullDescription: This predictive analytics solution combines time series analysis with external market indicators to forecast sales with high accuracy. It includes automated feature engineering and model retraining pipelines.

documentProcessing.title: Document Processing System
documentProcessing.description: Intelligent document understanding system for automated data extraction and classification.
documentProcessing.fullDescription: An end-to-end document processing pipeline that uses OCR, NLP, and machine learning to extract, classify, and validate information from various document types including invoices, contracts, and forms.

inventoryOptimization.title: Inventory Optimization
inventoryOptimization.description: AI-driven inventory management system reducing costs while maintaining optimal stock levels.
inventoryOptimization.fullDescription: This system uses reinforcement learning and demand forecasting to optimize inventory levels across multiple warehouses. It considers factors like seasonality, lead times, and storage costs to minimize holding costs while preventing stockouts.

customerSegmentation.title: Customer Segmentation
customerSegmentation.description: Advanced clustering algorithms for precise customer segmentation and personalized marketing.
customerSegmentation.fullDescription: Using unsupervised learning techniques, this system analyzes customer behavior patterns to create meaningful segments. It integrates with marketing platforms to enable personalized campaigns and improve customer engagement.
